articles.title: Many faces of Rmarkdown
articles.contents:
Contents
Welcome
Introduction
Links
Acknowledgments




Welcome
These are the materials for an invited talk for R-ladies Dammam by Dr. Selcan Aydin.






fitvids('.shareagain', {players: 'iframe'});


Introduction
I assume that you have heard of R Markdown and maybe gave knitting a try. If not, no worries you will get to try it now! This will be a very hands-on session where together we will:
Knit an Rmarkdown file to html. Make it prettier!
Build a website using Rmarkdown. Share it with the world?
Please make sure you have installed the packages below:


install.packages(c("DT", "palmerpenguins"))

Link to this website:
Slides
Acknowledgments
This website is made with the distill package and a custom theme by Alison Hill & Desirée De Leon.
